    • applications

      private Map<String,BTOApplication> applications

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationService

      public ApplicationService()
      Constructs a new ApplicationService. Initializes the internal application map.

  • Method Details

    • loadApplications

      public Map<String,BTOApplication> loadApplications(List<Project> projects)
      Loads BTO application data from applications.csv. Validates application IDs (uniqueness), dates, and enum values. Tracks applications with 'BOOKED' status and adjusts the `availableUnits` in the corresponding Project's FlatTypeDetails objects provided in the `projects` list. Populates the internal application map.
      Specified by:
      loadApplications in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      projects - A list of all Project objects, used for finding projects and adjusting their unit counts.
      Returns:
      A copy of the map containing all loaded applications (ApplicationID to BTOApplication object).

    • saveApplications

      public void saveApplications(Map<String,BTOApplication> applicationsToSave)
      Saves the provided map of BTO applications to applications.csv. Formats application data for CSV storage. Overwrites the existing file. Updates the internal application map to match the saved state.
      Specified by:
      saveApplications in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicationsToSave - The map of applications (ApplicationID to BTOApplication object) to save.

    • findApplicationById

      public BTOApplication findApplicationById(String applicationId)
      Finds a BTO application by its unique ID from the internally managed map.
      Specified by:
      findApplicationById in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to find.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object if found, or null otherwise.

    • findApplicationByApplicantAndProject

      public BTOApplication findApplicationByApplicantAndProject(String nric, String projectName)
      Finds a specific BTO application based on the applicant's NRIC and the project name. Constructs the expected application ID (NRIC_ProjectName) and uses `findApplicationById`.
      Specified by:
      findApplicationByApplicantAndProject in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object if found, or null if NRIC/projectName is null or the application doesn't exist.

    • getApplicationsByProject

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a list of all BTO applications submitted for a specific project. Filters the internal application map based on the projectName field.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationsByProject in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOApplication objects for the specified project. Returns an empty list if projectName is null or no applications are found.

    • getApplicationsByStatus

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByStatus(ApplicationStatus status)
      Retrieves a list of all BTO applications that currently have a specific status. Filters the internal application map based on the status field.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationsByStatus in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      status - The ApplicationStatus to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOApplication objects with the specified status. Returns an empty list if status is null or no applications match.

    • getApplicationsByApplicant

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByApplicant(String nric)
      Retrieves a list of all BTO applications submitted by a specific applicant. Filters the internal application map based on the applicantNric field.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationsByApplicant in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOApplication objects submitted by the specified applicant. Returns an empty list if nric is null or no applications are found.

    • addApplication

      public void addApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Adds a new BTO application to the internal map if an application with the same ID doesn't already exist. Prints an error message if a duplicate ID is detected.
      Specified by:
      addApplication in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplication object to add.

    • removeApplication

      public boolean removeApplication(String applicationId)
      Removes a BTO application from the internal map based on its ID.
      Specified by:
      removeApplication in interface IApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to remove. If null, the method does nothing.
      Returns:
      true if the application was found and removed, false otherwise.

    • getAllApplications

      public Map<String,BTOApplication> getAllApplications()
      Retrieves a copy of the map containing all BTO applications currently managed by the service. Returning a copy prevents external modification of the internal state.
      Specified by:
      getAllApplications in interface IApplicationService
      Returns:
      A new HashMap containing all applications (ApplicationID to BTOApplication object).
